Question.Subject: Anyone on Karaoke Channel Online? Question: Why is voice always off from music?
Question.Content: I know how to use the + and - under song edit, but I still can't seem to get the timing right. I can't even make any of my songs public yet, because of this problem! Why should I have to adjust it anyway? Every single song I sing is way off and seems to get only worse throughout the song, but I sing just as the lines for the lyrics prompt me to! I'm getting irratated! Anyone else have this problem? How can I fix it? Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
We understand how frustrating out-of-sync recordings can be and want to assure you that we are investigating the issue that has been reported by a few of our members. Would you be kind enough to log in to your account at the website and complete the feedback form: http://www.thekaraokechannel.com/online#page=feedback
By logging in and submitting the form, the support team will know your profile name and be able to investigate your specific recordings. If you could provide a list of the recordings that are specifically out-of-sync that would be great.
Please do not delete your recordings, as it is possible that they can be fixed.
Thank you for your participation at The KARAOKE Channel ONLINE.
